p:
Samples for the NMR experiments were prepared at 1 mM C6a and C6b concentrations, in a mixture of d
38 -DPC or d
25 -SDS 90:10 M/M (27 mM/3 mM) in aqueous solution (pH 7.4, 10 mM phosphate buffer containing H 2O/D 2O). [ 46] For the spin label experiments, the 5- and 16-doxylstearic acids were solubilized in dimethyl sulfoxide-d 6 and then added to the samples.
